content.rendered:
Home

Pre-Primary Level

  • Engaging Learning: Pre-primary education at Royale Concorde International School is designed around engaging, activity-based programs that foster cognitive skills and emphasize neatness.
  • Language Development: Our curriculum promotes phonetic-based language development, ensuring fluency in speech and writing.
  • Conceptual Learning: Through activities and field trips, children grasp concepts, fostering curiosity and exploration.
  • Creative Expression: We encourage creative expression through arts and crafts, nurturing a sense of imagination.
  • Fine Motor Skills: Indoor and outdoor activities enhance fine motor skill development.
  • Building Confidence: Activities like Rhyme Time, Show & Tell, and Talent Shows help build self-confidence and self-expression.
  • Social and Emotional Growth: In a friendly, caring 'home away from home,' we focus on social and emotional adjustment, celebrating cultural diversity with toy parties and festival celebrations.
  • Formative and Summative Tests: We assess students through formative and summative tests, divided into two terms, ensuring a comprehensive evaluation of academic performance.
